name: Light in the Dark (itch) (Mitchell Crane)
description:
This project was in a group of three people, two designers and a programmer. I was the level designer on this game and created the layout of the game as well as designing the puzzles. This was the second time I've used Unreal engine for a project. The project was playable on Oculus Rift but was not developed for it.

Light in the Dark is an Unreal engine game set in an ancient undiscovered pyramid. You enter but with no way out and barley any lights except for a orb of light named Olli. You must escape the Pyrimid with Olli's help guiding you through the darkness. Will you make it out alive?
